title: How do you tell when Riot has replied to a message sent to them
body: I asked Riot a question after clicking on how to get S+ how do you know when they have replied?{{summoner:4}}

replies.body: Submitted a ticket to player support.
You should receive an email notification when a reply is made to your ticket, you should also be able to view any open tickets from the support page (after you log in)

Hey there,

Where did you send the message?

Did you submit a ticket to player support? or did you attempt to contact Riot via other means (email, etc)?
